## tapOn() function

The sames as [tap()](./promizr.tap.md) but apply the `task` with `owner` as this context.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function tapOn<O, K extends MethodNames<O>>(owner: O, task: K, ...args: Parameters<O[K]>): <U>(arg: U) => Promise<U>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  owner | O | The this context to apply when calling the task |
|  task | K | The key on owner that contains the function to be called during tap |
|  args | Parameters&lt;O\[K\]&gt; | The arguments to apply to task |

<b>Returns:</b>

&lt;U&gt;(arg: U) =&gt; Promise&lt;U&gt;
